name: Gouriiii
greetingText: Incase you've forgotten, I'm a Developer, and here's a small surprise
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Gouriiiiüòä!! Wishing you many more happy returns of the day.... blehh!
text2: That's what I was about to do.
text4: I should make something by myself, that you might
outroText: Dear Gouriiii, A very very Happy Birthday to You.
beforeoutroText: Gouri, did you really think this was it, I've got another surprise for you.... Look behind you!!
wishText: You're truly an amazing person and I hope you have a great day ahead.
replayText: And this is my own coded website just for you, I hope you liked it.... Click this to rewatch, Yours truly~ RaviüòÅ
